pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Master metapackage for the complete illogical-impulse Hyprland desktop environment. This includes all functional metapackages (audio, backlight, basic utilities, fonts/themes, Hyprland compositor, KDE integration, XDG portals, Python development, screencapture tools, system toolkit, and widgets) plus all standalone packages (bibata cursor theme, microtex, OneUI4 icons, and quickshell widget toolkit).
Upstream: https://github.com/end-4/dots-hyprland
